title: Lion Safari Park and Lesedi Cultural Village Tour
description: This tour package near Johannesburg includes a guided tour of Lesedi Cultural Village showcasing five South African cultural groups, traditional lunch, song and dance performance, and a visit to Lion & Safari Park for a mini safari guided by a ranger in a malaria-free zone.

title: 5 Day Sanbona Luxury Dwyka Tented Lodge
description: Dwyka Tented Lodge in Sanbona Wildlife Reserve offers luxurious, eco-friendly accommodation in a secluded horseshoe bend of a dry Karoo ravine. Each of the nine spacious tents features an en-suite bathroom, outdoor shower, private deck with a heated plunge pool, and modern amenities like air conditioning, a private minibar, and Wi-Fi. Guests can unwind in the stylish lounge, dine under the stars in the boma, or enjoy treatments at the Relaxation Retreat. The lodge combines comfort with a romantic wilderness setting, providing an unforgettable safari experience.

title: 4 Day Sanbona Luxury Dwyka Tented Lodge
description: Experience the serene wilderness of Sanbona Wildlife Reserve during a 4-day safari at the Dwyka Tented Camp. Nestled in a secluded horseshoe bend, this luxurious camp blends seamlessly into the rugged beauty of the Little Karoo. Sanbona, one of South Africa’s largest private reserves, offers a conservation-focused safari where you can encounter diverse wildlife, explore ancient San rock art, and admire unique flora. Just 3.5 hours from Cape Town, the malaria-free reserve promises a tranquil escape filled with unforgettable game drives, scenic vistas, and the charm of the Western Cape’s natural heritage.

title: 3 Day Sanbona Luxury Dwyka Tented Lodge
description: Dwyka Tented Lodge in Sanbona Wildlife Reserve offers luxurious, eco-friendly accommodation in a secluded horseshoe bend of a dry Karoo ravine. Each of the nine spacious tents features an en-suite bathroom, outdoor shower, private deck with a heated plunge pool, and modern amenities like air conditioning, a private minibar, and Wi-Fi. Guests can unwind in the stylish lounge, dine under the stars in the boma, or enjoy treatments at the Relaxation Retreat. The lodge combines comfort with a romantic wilderness setting, providing an unforgettable safari experience.

title: 5 Day Sanbona Luxury Tilney Manor Tour
description: Enjoy a peaceful 5-day safari at Tilney Manor in the heart of Sanbona Wildlife Reserve. Surrounded by the rugged beauty of the Little Karoo, this historical manor offers magnificent views of undulating mountains and endless plains. With only six open-plan suites featuring private verandas, guests can indulge in secluded luxury while exploring the reserve’s diverse wildlife and ancient San rock art. Relax with authentic Karoo cuisine, unwind by the rim flow pool, or rejuvenate at the spa with a steam room and sauna, all set within a  conservation-driven wilderness just 3.5 hours from Cape Town. It’s the  closest true wildlife experience you can find near Cape Town, offering an exclusive and unique malaria-free safari.

title: 3 Day Coast Safari Tour
description: Experience the stunning beauty and serenity of the Garden Route while seizing the opportunity to encounter South Africa’s renowned Big 5 on a scenic safari tour. Journey from the southernmost tip of Africa to the oldest privately-owned game reserve in the Cape, and understand why the Garden Route is a favorite among tourists. Enjoy game drives in an open safari vehicle led by a knowledgeable ranger.
location: South Africa, Cape Town, Garden Route

title: 5 Day Luxury Sabi Sands Tengile River Lodge
description: Sabi Sands Tengile River Lodge offers a truly luxurious escape, with its suites designed for ultimate comfort and relaxation. Each suite features a private deck and plunge pool, providing an intimate connection to the stunning natural surroundings along the Sand River.

title: 4 Day Luxury Sabi Sands Tengile River Lodge
description: Welcome to Tengile River Lodge, a breath-taking sanctuary in Sabie Sands Game Reserve. This luxurious lodge offers an exceptional African wilderness experience, blending comfort and adventure amidst stunning scenery.

title: 3 Day Luxury Sabi Sands Tengile River Lodge
description:
Welcome to Tengile River Lodge, a breath-taking sanctuary in Sabie Sands Game Reserve. This luxurious lodge offers an exceptional African wilderness experience, blending comfort and adventure amidst stunning scenery. Guests can enjoy elegantly appointed suites with panoramic views of the river and landscape. The lodge features guided morning and sunset game drives and
bush walks (subject to availability) for encounters with diverse wildlife. With gourmet dining, rejuvenating wellness treatments, and attentive service, Tengile River Lodge is the ideal base for an unforgettable journey through one of South Africa’s most iconic game reserves.

title: 5-Day Luxury Timbavati Rockfig Safari Lodge
description:
RockFig Safari Lodge, located in the Timbavati Private Nature Reserve, is an exclusive lodge offering six luxury suites, spacious decks, and stunning views of the surrounding wilderness. The lodge focuses on personalized experiences for up to 12 guests, blending indoor and outdoor living, with a waterhole
nearby for frequent wildlife viewing. Guests enjoy game drives, walking safaris, and superb dining options. The lodge also offers a fire pit, boma dinners, and a focus on tailored luxury.

title: 4-Day Luxury Timbavati Rockfig Safari Lodge
description: RockFig Safari Lodge, located in the Timbavati Private Nature Reserve, is an exclusive lodge offering six luxury suites, spacious decks, and stunning views of the surrounding wilderness. The lodge focuses on personalized experiences for up to 12 guests, blending indoor and outdoor living, with a waterhole nearby for frequent wildlife viewing. Guests enjoy game drives, walking safaris, and superb dining options. The lodge also offers a fire pit, boma dinners, and a focus on tailored luxury.

title: 3-Day Luxury Timbavati Rockfig Safari Lodge
description: RockFig Safari Lodge, located in the Timbavati Private Nature Reserve in Greater Kruger, is an exclusive lodge offering six luxury suites, spacious decks, and stunning views of the surrounding wilderness. The lodge focuses on personalized experiences for up to 12 guests, blending indoor & outdoor living, with a waterhole nearby for frequent wildlife viewing. Enjoy game drives, walking safaris & superb dining options. The lodge also offers a fire pit, boma dinners, & a focus on tailored luxury.

title: 2 Day Radisson Kruger Fly-In Safari from Johannesburg
description:
Join us for an immersive 2 day bush experience like no other. On this incredible journey into Africa’s romantic safari world, see the best that the bush has to offer at the iconic Kruger National Park, as well as the pristine
Blue Canyon Reserve and Moditlo Private Game Reserve. Fly into Hoedspruit Eastgate Airport from Johannesburg and be met by your friendly guide for transport to the Radisson Hotel. Enjoy a tailored, catered experience that will leave no rock unturned in your quest for the ultimate African safari.

title: 2 Day Radisson Kruger Fly-In Safari from Cape Town
description:
Join us for an immersive 2 day bush experience like no other. On this incredible journey into Africa’s romantic safari world, see the best that the bush has to offer at the iconic Kruger National Park, as well as the pristine
Blue Canyon Reserve and Moditlo Private Game Reserve. Fly into Hoedspruit Eastgate Airport from Cape Town or Johannesburg and be met by your friendly guide for transport to the Radisson Hotel. Enjoy a tailored, catered experience that will leave no rock unturned in your quest for the ultimate African safari.

title: Ukutula Lion Park Day Trip
description: Located near Brits in the North West Province, Ukutula Lion Park is renowned for its dedication to wildlife conservation and educational experiences with Africa’s majestic predators. The park spans beautiful bushveld terrain, offering guests an opportunity to engage in unique lion interactions while learning about conservation efforts. Known as the “place of quiet,” Ukutula provides a peaceful yet thrilling environment where visitors can walk alongside lion cubs, interact with young lions, and gain insight into the behavior and preservation of these magnificent animals.

title: 15-Day Budget Southern Africa Tour from Cape Town
description: Join us on a captivating 15-day budget journey through South Africa and Zimbabwe. Explore iconic landmarks, coastal marvels, and local cuisine in Cape Town. Immerse yourself in Soweto’s cultural richness before before thrilling game drives in Kruger National Park. Experience a sunset cruise at Victoria Falls and wildlife encounters at Chobe National Park. This curated tour blends natural beauty, cultural immersion, and unforgettable experiences.
location: South Africa, Cape Town, Johannesburg, Kruger National Park, Soweto, Southern Africa, Victoria Falls, Zimbabwe

title: 15-Day Luxury Southern Africa Tour from Cape Town
description:
Join us on a captivating 15-day journey through South Africa and Zimbabwe. Explore iconic landmarks, coastal marvels, and local cuisine in Cape Town. Immerse yourself in Soweto’s cultural richness before before thrilling game drives in Kruger National Park. Experience a sunset cruise at Victoria Falls
and wildlife encounters at Chobe National Park. This curated tour blends natural beauty, cultural immersion, and unforgettable experiences.
location: South Africa, Cape Town, Johannesburg, Kruger National Park, Soweto, Southern Africa, Victoria Falls, Zimbabwe

title: 15-Day Mid-Range Southern Africa Tour from Cape Town
description: Experience a 15-day journey through South Africa and Zimbabwe, beginning in vibrant Cape Town. Explore iconic landmarks, coastal wonders, and indulge in local cuisine. Transition to Johannesburg for cultural immersion in Soweto before venturing into the wild at Tremisana Lodge for thrilling safaris. Fly to Victoria Falls for a breath-taking sunset cruise on the Zambezi River and a misty rainforest exploration. Wrap up your adventure with a day trip to Chobe National Park for wildlife encounters. This curated tour blends natural beauty, cultural  heritage, and unforgettable wildlife experiences.
location: South Africa, Cape Town, Johannesburg, Soweto, Southern Africa, Victoria Falls, Zimbabwe
